question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. person with black backpack on the left
B. train station info board
C. None
D. None

options.A: person with black backpack on the left

triage_reason: The person with the black backpack is in the foreground on the platform, while the info board is further back under the station roof, making the backpack wearer clearly closer.
